backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing profiles, access control, and audio submissions with admin checks and user-specific queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to files, components, and test requirements for deployment verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files used for reference in build planning.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERIFICATION.md: Detailed deployment verification checklist covering provider hierarchy, UI changes, and post-deploy tests.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
Shell script that rebuilds and redeploys the frontend canister with retry logic.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the router in AuthProvider to provide global auth context.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin UI for reviewing audio submissions, approving/rejecting them, and viewing artist profiles.
frontend/src/components/CreatorZoneAuthC: Renders a logout button for authenticated users, otherwise nothing.
frontend/src/components/CreatorZoneTab.t: Form UI for submitting audio metadata with duration, premium flag, and idle logout alerts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders app footer with branding, year, and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenLoadin: Full‑screen loading screen with spinner and optional message.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling login state, user profile, role-based studio link, and identity transitions.
frontend/src/components/RouteAccessGuard: Guards routes based on authentication and admin role, redirecting or blocking until resolved.
frontend/src/components/TestingModeBanne: Displays fixed banner indicating the app is in testing mode.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Manages auth state using Internet Identity, idle auto‑logout, and navigation on logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates backend actor tied to identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, and admin status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Renders the home page with a welcome header and creator zone section.
frontend/src/pages/Studio.tsx: Loads the caller’s profile and displays the admin studio panel with a loading state.
frontend/src/router.ts: Creates and exports the application router based on the route tree.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the root layout and routes for Home and Studio using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, and deployment requirements for the VAANI app.
